## Compiler.compile() method

Compiles the provided response output or string based on the provided request and context.

It is used for compiling conditions on a response or injecting variables into responses.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
compile(input: string, request: Request, context: Context): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | string | Either a string or a set of responses. |
|  request | Request | The request |
|  context | [Context](./stentor-models.context.md) | Context object |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
